overview: A humpy muscleman tries to make some extra cash by hustling his famous pecs and throbbing, large tool to a couple of willing, horny customers! Unknown to him, a black voodoo stud has the hots for him; and succeeds in luring him to his beach house AND his bed!
tagline: Muscleman Jim Cassidy Gets Blasted By Black Voodoo!
title: Desires of the Devil
